<font class="generalcy">

### Extra Code Block

#### example

<font class="c%wcode_l_a42&43_b11&12">

```C
/* randomly select an element */

int RandomizedSelect(int A[], int index, int left, int right) {
    if (left == right) {
        return A[left];
    }
    int i = RandomizedPartition(A, left, right);
    if (i + 1 == index) {
        return A[i];
    } else if (i + 1 < index) {
        return RandomizedSelect(A, index, i + 1, right);
    } else {
        return RandomizedSelect(A, index, left, i - 1);
    }
}
```

<font class="c%wcode_r_a42&43_b11&12">

```C
/* randomly select an element */

int RandomizedSelect(int A[], int index, int left, int right) {
    if (left == right) {
        return A[left];
    }
    int i = RandomizedPartition(A, left, right);
    if (i + 1 == index) {
        return A[i];
    } else if (i + 1 < index) {
        return RandomizedSelect(A, index, i + 1, right);
    } else {
        return RandomizedSelect(A, index, left, i - 1);
    }
}
```

<font class="c%wcode_l_a42&0_b0&4">

```C linenums="1"
/* randomly select an element */

int RandomizedSelect(int A[], int index, int left, int right) {
    if (left == right) {
        return A[left];
    }
    int i = RandomizedPartition(A, left, right);
    if (i + 1 == index) {
        return A[i];
    } else if (i + 1 < index) {
        return RandomizedSelect(A, index, i + 1, right);
    } else {
        return RandomizedSelect(A, index, left, i - 1);
    }
}
```

------------------------------- BORDER -------------------------------

#### usage

```html
<font class="symbol">

</font>
```
`symbol`: `c:<classname>[_(l|r)_(a[n]&[n])_(b[n]&[n])]`

- `l|r` must be set at pos 1
- `a`: margin top / bottom of the whole block including code block and text
- `b`: margin left / right of code block


**example**:


<font class="c%wcode_l">

> d啊啊
```asm
;abcdefg
_add_a_and_b:
   push   %ebx
   mov    %eax, [%esp+8] 
   mov    %ebx, [%esp+12]
   add    %eax, %ebx 
   pop    %ebx 
   ret  

_main:
   push   3
   push   2
   call   _add_a_and_b 
   add    %esp, 8
``` 
得得 

</font>






</font>
